attributes.action: get the london link coach fromFarnborough Hants to London more regularly than only the one a day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We used to have a coach run from Bradfords roundabout nearly every hour from first thing in the morning, it was always full up with people travelling to work and going to victoria coach station and they stopped it now we only have one about 8.30 so if you wanted to catch a coach from Victoria say about 9. 30 it would not be possible.
Why they stopped it nobody knows.Please can we have it back.

rejection.details: Suggest you contact your local authority in the first instance.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
